chapters.title: Chapter 25: The Road to the Spear
chapters.info: Rhodric, p. 406 (362)—Comran's greatfather. He led the Aiel to kill armored soldiers who crossed the Spine of the World. He is also the person through whose eyes Rand sees in his second step through the columns of Rhuidean. See also Comran; Jeordam; Mandein.
